action.content: DESCRIPTION: The room features a reception desk made of light wood with a yellow lamp on the left side. Above the desk, there is a sign that reads "The University of Vermont." On the wall behind the desk, there is a framed picture of a building with a spire. To the right of the desk, there is a computer monitor and some office supplies. The room has a warm, welcoming ambiance with light-colored walls and wooden accents.
action.label: response
